about_desc: My name is Dusan Simic. I graduated from University of Belgrade and I have professional knowledge and considerable experience in frontend as well as in backend programming. For over 7 years, I completed 30+ projects from small to medium even to large ones, from eCommerce websites to more complex and large-scaled ones. My main technical skills are Html/CSS/JavaScript/PHP, React, WordPress and Express. I have expert skills in enterprise web development associated with planning & implementation tool, task tracker app, calendar tool and project tracking web application.
experience_0_job: Senior Full Stack WordPress (Expert in React) Developer
experience_0_overview: Successfully upgraded the company's website, resulting in a 35% increase in user engagement, a 25% boost in conversion rate, and a 15% reduction in bounce rate. Streamlined payment processing and implemented customized solutions using the Stripe API, contributing to a 20% growth in subscriptions and revenue. Optimized website performance and SEO, leading to a 50% improvement in load times and a 30% rise in search rankings, further enhancing customer satisfaction and overall business growth.
experience_1_job: Senior Full Stack WordPress Developer - Webmasters Group
experience_1_overview: Utilized the latest web development technologies and modernized site-building workflows using tools streamlining processes  and reducing development time by 20%. Implemented multiple custom RESTful API integrations, connecting WordPress  platforms with third-party services such as CRM systems, E-commerce platforms. Engineered and implemented 30+ custom  WordPress plugins and back-end solutions, leading 20% increase in overall company revenue.  • Utilized the latest web development technologies, including Progressive Web Apps (PWAs), headless WordPress, and JAMstack  architecture, to create high-performance, scalable, and future-proof websites that offered improved user experience and SEO  benefits.  • Implemented multiple custom RESTful API integrations, connecting WordPress platforms with hird-party services such as CRM  systems, E-commerce platforms.  • Launched 7 elegant animation-oriented websites using Vue.js, resulting in a 40% reduction of loading time
experience_2_job: Senior WordPress Developer, JS Web DEV Ltd.
experience_2_overview: Successfully consolidated multiple management systems into a unified CRM platform, reducing system maintenance costs by 30% after consolidating the management systems. Reduced the time it takes to generate reports by 50% through the implementation of a new data analytics tool, saving 10 hours per week for the team. Led an Agile development team to deliver a new project ahead of schedule, enhancing the company's reputation for timely, quality solutions.
